display_long_description:
🏸A chilling moment between Friends ? Or maybe a hilarious session with power items? Perfect you’re at the right place in Badminton Time!🏸

# 🗨️ In a few words:

"Quest 3's BEST Badminton VR Experience Is Here!" - BMFVR

"This new VR game is endless fun!" - Tarapeutic

"Decathlon made a vr badminton game and it's SUPER FUN" - VR ManCave

"I played Badminton Time with my good friend and it was an absolute blast" - OtterWorldly

"I don’t get excited about too many games, but Badminton Time completely blew me away!" - KaleahVR

"I went into this game expecting it to be another racket-type sports game but this is so much more than that! It's like badminton VR game meets Mario Party??" - VRwithJasmine

[media]
🌎 **Travel the world** to discover incredible places : Grand canyon, Japanese garden, North pole, Snowy forest, Paradise island, ...


👨‍🦱 Start your adventure in **customizing your avatar**: sports & funky outfits, glasses, hats, rackets, ...
[media]

📜 Discover all the **game modes**: 
- In **realistic gameplay**, the game delivers top-notch simulation physics like in the real world
- In **arcade gameplay**, you use **power items** to drive your opponent crazy!
[media]
- In **mini games**, you will discover 5 different mini-games to show who is the king!
[media]
- In **training**, you can participate in different sessions to improve your skills.
[media]

🏆Don't forget you can play alone, against AI and with humans. Up to 4 in the same match or mini game! So be ready for **matchmaking** or to **invite your friends** to join your party!
[media]
